(OOC)

/rant mode on

To clear things up a bit before the kindegarden rejec=
ts get sent to the corner:

1) a single celled anything would not have a pu=
pose. To have purpose you have to be self aware which said organisms are no=
t.

2) No a single celled organism could not exist in space. While it doesn=
't need to breath it still needs to absorb material to survive. Space dust =
is not going to keep it alive...if the radiation in space doesn't kill it i=
nstantly.

3) If you're going to have a "ghostly" entity floating about at =
least do some research on previous occurances. Starscream happens to be the=
 prime example of this type of character. His spark for whatever reason did=
 not join the matrix when his body got slagged on multiple occassions. His =
spark roamed space "possessing" bots. This is the closest sensible thing I =
could compare this cutie crap to.

4) Last but certainly least can you guys=
 ever just agree to disagree and let the council settle an arguement instea=
d of squabbling like spoiled children? I know rauq and the others must be b=
usy but getting 50 odd emails, 90% of which is a bitch fest back and forth =
is annoying.

/end rant mode
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jeeper=
s Creepers 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 07, 20=
02 11:10 PM
  Subject: Amoeba


  OOC:  Yes, they are a single cell, just l=
ike your brain dewboy, and no they can't survive in space.  They still need=
 to thrive off of certain Earthly things, you know.
